title: Post Process Animation
description: Gives the possibility to spawn animated post process effects
longDescription:
This plugin aims to give for the user the possibility to spawn simple animated post process effects.

The behavior of these effects is similar to particle systems / sound effects (can be single or looped).

Post Process Animation Component can animate Post Process Settings or Material Parameters Collection.

It useful when player is hurt or healed (single impulse effects to camera).

Also it is useful to add continuous buff effects (looped post process animation until it will destroyed).



The plugin uses curves to animate post process.

Each curve can animate one or more Post Process Settings or parameter from Material Parameter Collection.

It supports only Linear Color parameters.



The Post Process Settings parameters names must be taken from https://docs.unrealengine.com/en-US/API/Runtime/Engine/Engine/FPostProcessSettings/index.html (Only Vector4 properties).


Post Process Animation Component uses unbound Post Process Volume to show and blend effects.


Quick demo video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kJTLRs3vXnA

Use case: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xpMKlRH16uo
